trans-unit.source: Welcome to the Virtual Map Forum 2.0
New to the Virtual Map Forum 2.0?
The minimum length of the password is 9 characters.
The username is already in use. Please choose another one.
Switch to 3D is not possible for this resolution. Please zoom in.
Choose whether the uploaded data should be permanently available as a searchable map or only temporarily for you personally in your browser.
Please give your vector map a name and select whether the map should be saved permanently.
Edit the graphic settings for the vector element here and assign a title, an image and a description. You can create your own fields below.
Do you really want to delete the data?
You currently have unsaved changes to this vector map.Are you sure you want to discard these changes?
A newer version of the vector map already exists on the server. Please reload the map and apply your changes to the new version of the map.
We could not find a image. Please check the link again.
Add a title, description and a preview image for your new vector map here
Edit the settings for the entire vector map here. You can define the title, description and preview image here.
Select an earlier version of the vector map here by first browsing the older versions and then resetting.
Do you really want to delete this vector map?
The supplied geojson file could not be parsed.
A layer could not be mounted. The corresponding feature was unselected.
Welcome to the Virtual Map Forum 2.0.
Please choose your map collection in the search menu on the left side
The upload of the mosaic map has failed
The overview update request has failed
Could not load the list of mosaic maps
The deletion of the mosaic map has failed
The selected mosaic map will be deleted permanently
Saving the mosaic map will overwrite the old state.
The persisted maps could not be restored.
There is an error with the persisted map state and it could not be restored.
The selected map could not be loaded.
The restored map view was created in an old version of the map forum. This may result in deviations of the view.
Style keys are not allowed in custom properties
Predefined keys are not allowed in custom properties
Get a magnifier for the map
(Press X to increase and Y to decrease)

The permalink function allows sharing the current map view. Custom content, such as geojson layers or additional basemaps, cannot be shared with this function. The map view tab, which is only accessible when logged in, allows sharing of all content.
The map view function allows sharing the entire application state. For this purpose, a representation of the application state is uploaded and a unique link to this representation is generated.
Please insert a URL to a WMS Capabilities for adding an WMS as a base map. A WMS GetCapabilities URL should look like a Capabilities-Request.
Please select the wms layer which should be used as a base map.
The selected base map is not available
The URL you entered is invalid or does not support WMS services. Please check the URL and try again.
Confirm georeference params without clip params?
For producing a georeference preview you need at least 4 ground control points.
Your clip polygon seems to be malformed. Please check it again or try to contact the administrator.

Clicking Save will save your georeferencing results. In a few minutes they will be available to everyone via the Virtual Map Forum. If your georeferencing is still not published on the Virtual Map Forum after several hours, please contact an administrator.
You must be logged in to carry out this action.
You are not allowed to carry out this action.
An unexpected error occured. Please contact an administrator.
Please upload a file before submitting.
Your search input does not match the expected format. Correct example: oai:de:slub-dresden:vk:id-10010325.
The uploaded map has not yet been processed. Please try refreshing.
Make sure all the words are spelled correctly.
The map may be stored under a different term.
Upload the map and georefrenze it.
We could not find a map for the ID.
The maps have been updated. Please wait a few minutes and then reload the map. Alternatively, you can upload or edit more maps.
The uploaded map has not yet been processed. Please wait an instant and click on Refresh.
Do you really want to delete the card and data?
Map selected but not yet saved.
No features present. Create a new one now.
